verses.verse: Now Jericho<WH3405> was tightly<WH5462> shut up<WH5462> because<WH6440> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478> No one went out,<WH3318> and no one came in.<WH935>
Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Joshua,<WH3091> "Behold,<WH7200> I have given<WH5414> Jericho<WH3405> into your hand,<WH3027> with its king<WH4428> and the mighty men<WH1368> of valor.<WH2428>
All your men<WH582> of war<WH4421> shall march around<WH5437> the city,<WH5892> going around<WH5362> the city<WH5892> once.<WH6471> You shall do<WH6213> this six<WH8337> days.<WH3117>

Seven<WH7651> priests<WH3548> shall bear<WH5375> seven<WH7651> trumpets<WH7782> of rams<WH3104>' horns before<WH6440> the ark.<WH727> On the seventh<WH7637> day,<WH3117> you shall march<WH5437> around the city<WH5892> seven<WH7651> times,<WH6471> and the priests<WH3548> shall blow<WH8628> the trumpets.<WH7782>

It shall be that when they make a long<WH4900> blast with the ram<WH3104>'s horn,<WH7161> and when you hear<WH8085> the sound<WH6963> of the trumpet,<WH7782> all the people<WH5971> shall shout<WH7321> with a great<WH1419> shout;<WH7321> and the wall<WH2346> of the city<WH5892> shall fall down<WH5307> flat,<WH8478> and the people<WH5971> shall go up<WH5927> every man straight before him.<WH376>"

Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126> called<WH7121> the priests,<WH3548> and said<WH559> to them,<WH5375> "Take up the ark<WH727> of the covenant,<WH1285> and let seven<WH7651> priests<WH3548> bear<WH5375> seven<WH7651> trumpets<WH7782> of rams<WH3104>' horns before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of Yahweh.<WH3068>"
They said<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> "Advance!<WH5674> March around<WH5437> the city,<WH5892> and let the armed<WH2502> men pass on<WH5674> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068>'s ark.<WH727>"

It was so,<WH3091> that when Joshua had spoken<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> the seven<WH7651> priests<WH3548> bearing<WH5375> the seven<WH7651> trumpets<WH7782> of rams<WH3104>' horns before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> advanced,<WH5674> and blew<WH8628> the trumpets;<WH7782> and the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> followed<WH1980> them.<WH310>

The armed<WH2502> men went<WH1980> before<WH6440> the priests<WH3548> who blew<WH8628> the trumpets,<WH7782> and the ark<WH727> went<WH1980> after<WH310> them.<WH622> The trumpets<WH7782> sounded<WH8628> as they went.<WH1980>

Joshua<WH3091> commanded<WH6680> the people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> "You shall not shout,<WH7321> nor let your voice<WH6963> be heard,<WH8085> neither shall any word<WH1697> proceed<WH3318> out of your mouth,<WH6310> until the day<WH3117> I tell<WH559> you to shout.<WH7321> Then you shall shout.<WH7321>"

So he caused the ark<WH727> of Yahweh<WH3068> to go around<WH5437> the city,<WH5892> going about<WH5362> it once.<WH6471> Then they came<WH935> into the camp,<WH4264> and lodged<WH3885> in the camp.<WH4264>
Joshua<WH3091> rose early<WH7925> in the morning,<WH1242> and the priests<WH3548> took up<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

The seven<WH7651> priests<WH3548> bearing<WH5375> the seven<WH7651> trumpets<WH7782> of rams<WH3104>' horns before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of Yahweh<WH3068> went on<WH1980> continually,<WH1980> and blew<WH8628> the trumpets:<WH7782> and the armed men<WH2502> went<WH1980> before<WH6440> them.<WH622> The rear guard came<WH1980> after<WH310> the ark<WH727> of Yahweh.<WH3068> The trumpets<WH7782> sounded<WH8628> as they went.<WH1980>
The second<WH8145> day<WH3117> they marched around<WH5437> the city<WH5892> once,<WH6471> and returned<WH7725> into the camp.<WH4264> They did<WH6213> this six<WH8337> days.<WH3117>

It happened on the seventh<WH7637> day,<WH3117> that they rose early<WH7925> at the dawning<WH5927> of the day,<WH7837> and marched around<WH5437> the city<WH5892> in the same way<WH4941> seven<WH7651> times.<WH6471> Only on this day<WH3117> they marched around<WH5437> the city<WH5892> seven<WH7651> times.<WH6471>

It happened at the seventh<WH7637> time,<WH6471> when the priests<WH3548> blew<WH8628> the trumpets,<WH7782> Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> "Shout,<WH7321> for Yahweh<WH3068> has given<WH5414> you the city!<WH5892>

The city<WH5892> shall be devoted,<WH2764> even it and all that is in it,<WH3068> to Yahweh. Only Rahab<WH7343> the prostitute<WH2181> shall live,<WH2421> she and all who are with her in the house,<WH1004> because she hid<WH2244> the messengers<WH4397> that we sent.<WH7971>

But as for you,<WH7535> only keep<WH8104> yourselves from the devoted thing,<WH2764> lest when you have devoted<WH2763> it,<WH3947> you take of the devoted thing;<WH2764> so would you make<WH7760> the camp<WH4264> of Israel<WH3478> accursed,<WH2764> and trouble it.<WH5916>
But all the silver,<WH3701> and gold,<WH2091> and vessels<WH3627> of brass<WH5178> and iron,<WH1270> are holy<WH6944> to Yahweh.<WH3068> They shall come<WH935> into Yahweh<WH3068>'s treasury.<WH214>"

So the people<WH5971> shouted,<WH7321> and the priests blew<WH8628> the trumpets.<WH7782> It happened,<WH5971> when the people heard<WH8085> the sound<WH6963> of the trumpet,<WH7782> that the people<WH5971> shouted<WH7321> with a great<WH1419> shout,<WH8643> and the wall<WH2346> fell down flat,<WH5307> so that the people<WH5971> went up<WH5927> into the city,<WH5892> every man<WH376> straight before him,<WH3920> and they took the city.<WH5892>

They utterly destroyed<WH2763> all that was in the city,<WH5892> both man<WH376> and woman,<WH802> both young<WH5288> and old,<WH2205> and ox,<WH7794> and sheep,<WH7716> and donkey,<WH2543> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword.<WH2719>

Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> to the two<WH8147> men<WH582> who had spied out<WH7270> the land,<WH776> "Go<WH935> into the prostitute<WH2181>'s house,<WH1004> and bring out<WH3318> from there the woman<WH802> and all that she has,<WH7650> as you swore to her."

The young men<WH5288> who were spies<WH7270> went in,<WH935> and brought out<WH3318> Rahab<WH7343> with her father,<WH1> her mother,<WH517> her brothers,<WH251> and all that she had.<WH3318> They also brought out all her relatives,<WH4940> and they set<WH3240> them outside<WH2351> of the camp<WH4264> of Israel.<WH3478>

They burnt<WH8313> the city<WH5892> with fire,<WH784> and all that was in it.<WH5414> Only they put the silver,<WH3701> the gold,<WH2091> and the vessels<WH3627> of brass<WH5178> and of iron<WH1270> into the treasury<WH214> of Yahweh<WH3068>'s house.<WH1004>

But Rahab<WH7343> the prostitute,<WH2181> her father<WH1>'s household,<WH1004> and all that she had,<WH3091> Joshua saved<WH2421> alive.<WH2421> She lived<WH3427> in<WH7130> the midst of Israel<WH3478> to this day,<WH3117> because she hid<WH2244> the messengers,<WH4397> whom Joshua<WH3091> sent<WH7971> to spy out<WH7270> Jericho.<WH3405>

Joshua<WH3091> commanded<WH7650> them with an oath at that time,<WH6256> saying,<WH559> "Cursed<WH779> is the man<WH376> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> who rises up<WH6965> and builds<WH1129> this city<WH5892> Jericho.<WH3405> With the loss of his firstborn<WH1060> shall he lay its foundation,<WH3245> and with the loss of his youngest<WH6810> son shall he set up<WH5324> its gates.<WH1817>"
So Yahweh<WH3068> was with Joshua;<WH3091> and his fame<WH8089> was in all the land.<WH776>
